statements: UPDATE social_media_posts SET likes = 100 WHERE post_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE social_media_posts SET comments = (comments + 1) WHERE post_id = '456e89b9-e89b-42a0-a789-426ab5174000';
UPDATE social_media_posts SET likes = 100, comments = 50 WHERE post_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE social_media_posts SET shares = 200, post_text = 'Updated Text' WHERE post_id = '876e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174009';
UPDATE posts SET likes = 10, comments = 5 WHERE post_id = 1;
UPDATE users SET email = 'user@example.com' WHERE user_id = 2;
UPDATE posts SET likes = 100 WHERE post_id = 1;
UPDATE users SET username = 'new_username', email = 'new_email@example.com' WHERE user_id = 2;
UPDATE posts SET post_content='New content', likes_count=10 WHERE post_id=1;
UPDATE users SET email='new@email.com', username='new_username' WHERE user_id=2;
UPDATE posts SET post_content = 'Updated post content', likes_count = likes_count + 1 WHERE post_id = 123;
UPDATE post_engagement SET engagement_time = '2021-10-15 08:30:00' WHERE post_id = 234 AND user_id = 567;
UPDATE posts SET text = 'Updated Text' WHERE post_id = 1;
UPDATE users SET email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE user_id = 2;
UPDATE posts SET text = 'New Text', likes = 100 WHERE post_id = 1;
UPDATE post_comments SET comment_text = 'Updated Comment', user_id = 2 WHERE post_id = 1;
UPDATE posts SET text_content = 'Updated post text' WHERE post_id = 1;
UPDATE comments SET comment_content = 'New comment content' WHERE comment_id = 2;
UPDATE posts SET likes = likes + 1, shares = shares - 1 WHERE post_id = 123;
UPDATE users SET email = 'new_email@example.com', username = 'new_username' WHERE user_id = 456;
